LuaScript:
function onLoad()
    buttonContainer = getObjectFromGUID('0f1ba4')
    buttonContainer.createButton(
        {
            click_function = 'setup',
            function_owner = Global,
            label          = 'Setup',
            position       = {
                0, 0.01, 1.5
            },
            scale = {
                2,
                2,
                2
            },
            width          = 400,
            height         = 120
        }
    )
end

function setup()
    -- Place Discovery cards
    buttonContainer.removeButton(#buttonContainer.getButtons() - 3)
    local singleCardsGUIDs = {}
    for _, aCard in ipairs(getObjects()) do
        if aCard.type == 'Card' then
            table.insert(singleCardsGUIDs, aCard.getGUID())
        end
    end
    for _, aDeck in ipairs(getObjects()) do
        if aDeck.type == 'Deck' then
            aDeck.shuffle()
            Wait.time(
                function()
                    local deckGUID = aDeck.getGUID()
                    aDeck.takeObject(
                        {
                            position = {
                                aDeck.getPosition().x,
                                aDeck.getPosition().y + 3,
                                aDeck.getPosition().z
                            },
                            smooth = true,
                            flip = true
                        }
                    )
                    Wait.time(
                        function()
                            for _, remainingCards in ipairs(getObjects()) do
                                if remainingCards.type == 'Deck' or (remainingCards.type == 'Card' and remainingCards.is_face_down) then
                                    remainingCards.destruct()
                                end
                            end
                        end,
                        0.6
                    )
                end,
                0.6
            )
        end
    end

    -- Deal Game sheets
    local drawer = getObjectFromGUID('3dcbdd')
    drawer.call('onButtonClick')
    Wait.time(
        function()
            local gameSheetsBag = getObjectFromGUID('ff8268')
            for _, playerColorName in ipairs(getSeatedPlayers()) do
                for _, hand in ipairs(Hands.getHands()) do
                    local data = hand.getData()
                    for k, v in pairs(data) do
                        if k == "ColorDiffuse" then
                            local handZoneColor = cloneWithAlpha1(v)
                            local playerColor = Color.fromString(playerColorName)
                            if handZoneColor == playerColor then
                                local newPosition = nil
                                local newRotation = nil
                                if hand.getRotation().y == 0 then
                                    newPosition = {
                                        hand.getPosition().x,
                                        hand.getPosition().y,
                                        hand.getPosition().z + 18
                                    }
                                end
                                if hand.getRotation().y == 90 then
                                    newPosition = {
                                        hand.getPosition().x + 11,
                                        hand.getPosition().y,
                                        hand.getPosition().z
                                    }
                                end
                                if hand.getRotation().y == 180 then
                                    newPosition = {
                                        hand.getPosition().x,
                                        hand.getPosition().y,
                                        hand.getPosition().z - 18
                                    }
                                end
                                if hand.getRotation().y == 270 then
                                    newPosition = {
                                        hand.getPosition().x - 11,
                                        hand.getPosition().y,
                                        hand.getPosition().z
                                    }
                                end
                                local newRotation = {hand.getRotation().x, hand.getRotation().y - 180, hand.getRotation().z}
                                gameSheetsBag.takeObject(
                                    {
                                        position = newPosition,
                                        rotation = newRotation,
                                        smooth = true,
                                        callback_function = function(takenSheet)
                                            Wait.time(
                                                function()
                                                    takenSheet.setLock(true)
                                                end,
                                                3
                                            )
                                        end
                                    }
                                )
                                break
                            end
                        end
                    end
                end
                Wait.time(
                    function()
                        drawer = getObjectFromGUID('661907')
                        drawer.call('onButtonClick')
                    end,
                    1
                )
            end
        end,
        2
    )
end

 -- alpha 1 is needed since equals() contemplated it
 function cloneWithAlpha1(color)
    local copy = color:copy()
    copy:set(copy.r, copy.g, copy.b, 1)
    return copy
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
--[[Coded by Exile]]

function onLoad()
    createUserInterface()
end

function createUserInterface()
    self.createButton({
        click_function = "onRollClick",
        tooltip = "Roll Dice",
        function_owner = self,
        position = {0,0.1,.75},
        height = 100,
        width = 500,
        font_size = 100,
        color = TRANSPARENT,
        label = 'Roll Dice'
    })

    self.createButton({
        click_function = "onRollClick",
        tooltip = "Roll Dice",
        function_owner = self,
        position = {0,-0.1,.75},
        rotation = {0,0,180},
        height = 100,
        width = 500,
        font_size = 100,
        color = TRANSPARENT,
        label = 'Roll Dice'
    })

    self.addContextMenuItem("Roll",
        function()
            onRollClick()
        end, false)
end

function onRollClick()
    pos = self.getPosition()
    pos.y = pos.y + 1

    objectSize = self.getBoundsNormalized().size

    zoneSpawn = {position = pos
         , scale = {objectSize.x, 1, objectSize.z }
         , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
         , callback = 'zoneCallback'
         , callback_owner = self
         , rotation = self.getRotation()
         , color = TRANSPARENT}
     spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
    local diceObjects = {}
    local diceCount = false

    for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
      if(o.type == "Dice") then
          table.insert(diceObjects, {guid = o.getGUID(), value = 0})
          o.roll()
          diceCount = true
      end
    --do something with the objects
    end

    --waits for the dice to finish rolling
    if(diceCount) then
        Wait.time(
            function()
                sortDice(diceObjects)
            end,
            3
        )
    end

    zone.destruct() --destroy the zone when you're done with it, to avoid clutter.
end

--sorts the dice by number
function sortDice(diceGuids)
    --prints guid
    for _,o in ipairs(diceGuids) do
        local dice = getObjectFromGUID(o.guid)
        o.value =  dice.getValue()
    end

    local sorted_table = table.sort(diceGuids, function(a,b) return a.value < b.value end)

    -- announce values
    local announcement = ""
    for _, obj in ipairs(sorted_table) do
        announcement = announcement .. "  " .. obj.value
    end
    announcement = announcement:sub(4)
    broadcastToAll(announcement)

    arrangeDice(sorted_table)
    --prints sorting
    --[[for _,o in ipairs(diceGuids) do
        print(o.guid .. '-' .. o.value)
    end]]

    --getObjectFromGUID(string)
end

function arrangeDice(diceGuids)
    local xOffset = -1.25 * self.getScale().x
    local yOffset = 1.75 * self.getScale().y
    local diceOffset = 1.25
    local lastValue = nil

    local xDice = 0
    local yDice = 0

    local rollerPos = self.getPosition()

    for _,o in ipairs(diceGuids) do
        local dice = getObjectFromGUID(o.guid)

        if(lastValue != nil) then
            if(lastValue < o.value) then
                xDice = xDice + diceOffset
                yDice = 0
            elseif(lastValue == o.value) then
                yDice = yDice - diceOffset
            end
        end

        dice.setPositionSmooth({(rollerPos.x + xOffset + xDice), (rollerPos.y + 1), (rollerPos.z + yOffset + yDice) }, false, false)

        lastValue = o.value
    end
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Assetbundle
ObjectStates.Description: Click to add an extension to the table.
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad()
    self.interactable = false;
    self.createButton({
    label = "",
    click_function = "onButtonClick",
    function_owner = self,
    width = 5000,
    height = 1000,
    color = {0, 0, 0, 0.0},
    position = {62.4, 40.75, 0},
    rotation = {0, 90, 90},
    font_size = 200
    })
end

function onButtonClick()
    self.setState( 1 + (self.getStateId() % 2) )

end

2.Name: Custom_Assetbundle
2.Description: Click on the handle to close.
2.LuaScript:
local ConcealedStorageHeight = 3.0
local ConceiledStorageOffset = 10000.0
local StorageState = 1
local ObjectLockStates = {}

local BB = {
	Min = {
		x = -16.0,
		y = 41.99,
		z = -50.0
	},
	Max = {
		x = 16.0,
		y = 41.99,
		z = -32.0
	}
}

function onSave()
    local saveObj = {};
	
    for k,v in pairs( ObjectLockStates ) do
        if v ~= nil then
			saveObj[k] = v;
        end
    end
	
    return JSON.encode( saveObj );
end

function onLoad( saveData )
    self.interactable = false;
	
	if saveData ~= "" then
		ObjectLockStates = JSON.decode( saveData ) or {};
	end
	
    self.createButton({
		label = "",
		click_function = "onButtonClick",
		function_owner = self,
		width = 1000,
		height = 750,
		color = {1, 0, 0, 0.0},
		position = {0, 40.7, 50.5},
		rotation = {-90, 0, 0},
		font_size = 200
    })
	
	if self.getStateId() ~= StorageState then
		Timer.create({
			identifier = ("onAfterLoad" .. self.guid),
			function_name = "onAfterLoad",
			delay = 0.2
		})
	end
end

function onAfterLoad()
	local pos = self.getPosition()
	local bounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
	local rot = self.getRotation()
	local direction = 1.0
	
	if rot.y == 0 then
		direction = -1.0
	end
	
	BB.Min.x = BB.Min.x + pos.x
	BB.Min.y = BB.Min.y + pos.y - 1.5
	BB.Min.z = (BB.Min.z * direction) + pos.z
	
	BB.Max.x = 	BB.Max.x + pos.x
	BB.Max.y = 	BB.Max.y + pos.y + ConcealedStorageHeight + 0.5
	BB.Max.z = (BB.Max.z * direction) + pos.z
	
	HideObjectsAbove( false )
end

function onButtonClick()
	local currentState = self.getStateId()
	local nextState = 1 + (currentState % 2)
	
	if currentState ~= StorageState then
		HideObjectsAbove( true )
	end
	
	self.script_state = onSave()
	self.setState( nextState )
end

function HideObjectsAbove( toggle )
    local objectsAbove = {}
	local BBMin = { x = BB.Min.x, y = BB.Min.y, z = BB.Min.z }
	local BBMax = { x = BB.Max.x, y = BB.Max.y, z = BB.Max.z }
	
	if not toggle then
		BBMin.y = BBMin.y - ConceiledStorageOffset
		BBMax.y = BBMax.y - ConceiledStorageOffset
	end
    
    for k,v in pairs( getAllObjects() ) do
        if v != self then
            if PointToAABBIntersect( BBMin, BBMax, v.getPosition() ) then
                if toggle then
                    Store( v )
                else
                    Dispense( v )
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

-- Assumes ||min|| < ||max||
function PointToAABBIntersect( min, max, point )
    if IsInRange( point.x, min.x, max.x ) and
       IsInRange( point.y, min.y, max.y ) and
       IsInRange( point.z, min.z, max.z ) then
	   return true
    end
    
    return false
end

function IsInRange( value, a, b )
	local min = 0
	local max = 0
	
	if a > b then
		max = a
		min = b
	else
		max = b
		min = a
	end
	
	if value > min and value < max then
		return true
	end
	
	return false
end

function Store( obj )
	local pos = obj.getPosition()
	local isLocked = obj.getLock()
	
	ObjectLockStates[obj.getGUID()] = isLocked;
	
    obj.interactable = false
    obj.setLock( true )
    obj.setPosition({
        x = pos.x,
        y = pos.y - ConceiledStorageOffset,
        z = pos.z
    })
end

function Dispense( obj )
	local pos = obj.getPosition()
	local originalLockStatus = ObjectLockStates[obj.getGUID()] or false
	
	ObjectLockStates[obj.getGUID()] = nil
	
    obj.setPosition({
        x = pos.x,
        y = pos.y + ConceiledStorageOffset,
        z = pos.z
    })
	
    obj.interactable = true
	obj.setLock( originalLockStatus or false )
end

	end

	BB.Min.y = BB.Min.y + pos.y - 1.5
	BB.Min.z = (BB.Min.z * direction) + pos.z
	
	BB.Max.x = 	BB.Max.x + pos.x
	BB.Max.y = 	BB.Max.y + pos.y + ConcealedStorageHeight + 0.5
	BB.Max.z = (BB.Max.z * direction) + pos.z
	
	HideObjectsAbove( false )
end

function onButtonClick()

	if currentState ~= StorageState then
		HideObjectsAbove( true )
	end

	self.setState( nextState )

    local objectsAbove = {}

	local BBMax = { x = BB.Max.x, y = BB.Max.y, z = BB.Max.z }
	
	if not toggle then
		BBMin.y = BBMin.y - ConceiledStorageOffset
		BBMax.y = BBMax.y - ConceiledStorageOffset
	end
    
    for k,v in pairs( getAllObjects() ) do
        if v != self then
            if PointToAABBIntersect( BBMin, BBMax, v.getPosition() ) then
                if toggle then
                    Store( v )
                else
                    Dispense( v )
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

-- Assumes ||min|| < ||max||
function PointToAABBIntersect( min, max, point )
    if IsInRange( point.x, min.x, max.x ) and
       IsInRange( point.y, min.y, max.y ) and
       IsInRange( point.z, min.z, max.z ) then
	   return true
    end
    
    return false
end

function IsInRange( value, a, b )
	local min = 0
	local max = 0
	
	if a > b then
		max = a
		min = b
	else
		max = b
		min = a
	end
	
	if value > min and value < max then
		return true
	end
	
	return false
end

function Store( obj )
	local pos = obj.getPosition()
	local isLocked = obj.getLock()
	
	ObjectLockStates[obj.getGUID()] = isLocked;
	
    obj.interactable = false
    obj.setLock( true )
    obj.setPosition({
        x = pos.x,
        y = pos.y - ConceiledStorageOffset,
        z = pos.z
    })
end

function Dispense( obj )
	local pos = obj.getPosition()
	local originalLockStatus = ObjectLockStates[obj.getGUID()] or false
	
	ObjectLockStates[obj.getGUID()] = nil
	
    obj.setPosition({
        x = pos.x,
        y = pos.y + ConceiledStorageOffset,
        z = pos.z
    })
	
    obj.interactable = true
	obj.setLock( originalLockStatus or false )
end

    self.interactable = false;
	
	if saveData ~= "" then
		ObjectLockStates = JSON.decode( saveData ) or {};
	end
	
    self.createButton({
		label = "",
		click_function = "onButtonClick",
		function_owner = self,
		width = 1000,
		height = 750,
		color = {1, 0, 0, 0.0},
		position = {0, 40.7, 50.5},
		rotation = {-90, 0, 0},
		font_size = 200
    })
	
	if self.getStateId() ~= StorageState then
		Timer.create({
			identifier = ("onAfterLoad" .. self.guid),
			function_name = "onAfterLoad",
			delay = 0.2
		})
	end
end

function onAfterLoad()
	local pos = self.getPosition()
	local bounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
	local rot = self.getRotation()
	local direction = 1.0
	
	if rot.y == 0 then
		direction = -1.0
	end
	
	BB.Min.x = BB.Min.x + pos.x
	BB.Min.y = BB.Min.y + pos.y - 1.5
	BB.Min.z = (BB.Min.z * direction) + pos.z
	
	BB.Max.x = 	BB.Max.x + pos.x
	BB.Max.y = 	BB.Max.y + pos.y + ConcealedStorageHeight + 0.5
	BB.Max.z = (BB.Max.z * direction) + pos.z
	
	HideObjectsAbove( false )
end

function onButtonClick()
	local currentState = self.getStateId()
	local nextState = 1 + (currentState % 2)
	
	if currentState ~= StorageState then
		HideObjectsAbove( true )
	end
	
	self.script_state = onSave()
	self.setState( nextState )
end

function HideObjectsAbove( toggle )
    local objectsAbove = {}
	local BBMin = { x = BB.Min.x, y = BB.Min.y, z = BB.Min.z }
	local BBMax = { x = BB.Max.x, y = BB.Max.y, z = BB.Max.z }
	
	if not toggle then
		BBMin.y = BBMin.y - ConceiledStorageOffset
		BBMax.y = BBMax.y - ConceiledStorageOffset
	end
    
    for k,v in pairs( getAllObjects() ) do
        if v != self then
            if PointToAABBIntersect( BBMin, BBMax, v.getPosition() ) then
                if toggle then
                    Store( v )
                else
                    Dispense( v )
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

-- Assumes ||min|| < ||max||
function PointToAABBIntersect( min, max, point )
    if IsInRange( point.x, min.x, max.x ) and
       IsInRange( point.y, min.y, max.y ) and
       IsInRange( point.z, min.z, max.z ) then
	   return true
    end
    
    return false
end

function IsInRange( value, a, b )
	local min = 0
	local max = 0
	
	if a > b then
		max = a
		min = b
	else
		max = b
		min = a
	end
	
	if value > min and value < max then
		return true
	end
	
	return false
end

function Store( obj )
	local pos = obj.getPosition()
	local isLocked = obj.getLock()
	
	ObjectLockStates[obj.getGUID()] = isLocked;
	
    obj.interactable = false
    obj.setLock( true )
    obj.setPosition({
        x = pos.x,
        y = pos.y - ConceiledStorageOffset,
        z = pos.z
    })
end

function Dispense( obj )
	local pos = obj.getPosition()
	local originalLockStatus = ObjectLockStates[obj.getGUID()] or false
	
	ObjectLockStates[obj.getGUID()] = nil
	
    obj.setPosition({
        x = pos.x,
        y = pos.y + ConceiledStorageOffset,
        z = pos.z
    })
	
    obj.interactable = true
	obj.setLock( originalLockStatus or false )
end

2.Name: Custom_Assetbundle
2.Description: Click on the handle to close.
2.LuaScript:
local ConcealedStorageHeight = 3.0
local ConceiledStorageOffset = 10000.0
local StorageState = 1
local ObjectLockStates = {}

local BB = {
	Min = {
		x = -16.0,
		y = 41.99,
		z = -50.0
	},
	Max = {
		x = 16.0,
		y = 41.99,
		z = -32.0
	}
}

function onSave()
    local saveObj = {};
	
    for k,v in pairs( ObjectLockStates ) do
        if v ~= nil then
			saveObj[k] = v;
        end
    end
	
    return JSON.encode( saveObj );
end

function onLoad( saveData )
    self.interactable = false;
	
	if saveData ~= "" then
		ObjectLockStates = JSON.decode( saveData ) or {};
	end
	
    self.createButton({
		label = "",
		click_function = "onButtonClick",
		function_owner = self,
		width = 1000,
		height = 750,
		color = {1, 0, 0, 0.0},
		position = {0, 40.7, 50.5},
		rotation = {-90, 0, 0},
		font_size = 200
    })
	
	if self.getStateId() ~= StorageState then
		Timer.create({
			identifier = ("onAfterLoad" .. self.guid),
			function_name = "onAfterLoad",
			delay = 0.2
		})
	end
end

function onAfterLoad()
	local pos = self.getPosition()
	local bounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
	local rot = self.getRotation()
	local direction = 1.0
	
	if rot.y == 0 then
		direction = -1.0
	end
	
	BB.Min.x = BB.Min.x + pos.x
	BB.Min.y = BB.Min.y + pos.y - 1.5
	BB.Min.z = (BB.Min.z * direction) + pos.z
	
	BB.Max.x = 	BB.Max.x + pos.x
	BB.Max.y = 	BB.Max.y + pos.y + ConcealedStorageHeight + 0.5
	BB.Max.z = (BB.Max.z * direction) + pos.z
	
	HideObjectsAbove( false )
end

function onButtonClick()
	local currentState = self.getStateId()
	local nextState = 1 + (currentState % 2)
	
	if currentState ~= StorageState then
		HideObjectsAbove( true )
	end
	
	self.script_state = onSave()
	self.setState( nextState )
end

function HideObjectsAbove( toggle )
    local objectsAbove = {}
	local BBMin = { x = BB.Min.x, y = BB.Min.y, z = BB.Min.z }
	local BBMax = { x = BB.Max.x, y = BB.Max.y, z = BB.Max.z }
	
	if not toggle then
		BBMin.y = BBMin.y - ConceiledStorageOffset
		BBMax.y = BBMax.y - ConceiledStorageOffset
	end
    
    for k,v in pairs( getAllObjects() ) do
        if v != self then
            if PointToAABBIntersect( BBMin, BBMax, v.getPosition() ) then
                if toggle then
                    Store( v )
                else
                    Dispense( v )
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

-- Assumes ||min|| < ||max||
function PointToAABBIntersect( min, max, point )
    if IsInRange( point.x, min.x, max.x ) and
       IsInRange( point.y, min.y, max.y ) and
       IsInRange( point.z, min.z, max.z ) then
	   return true
    end
    
    return false
end

function IsInRange( value, a, b )
	local min = 0
	local max = 0
	
	if a > b then
		max = a
		min = b
	else
		max = b
		min = a
	end
	
	if value > min and value < max then
		return true
	end
	
	return false
end

function Store( obj )
	local pos = obj.getPosition()
	local isLocked = obj.getLock()
	
	ObjectLockStates[obj.getGUID()] = isLocked;
	
    obj.interactable = false
    obj.setLock( true )
    obj.setPosition({
        x = pos.x,
        y = pos.y - ConceiledStorageOffset,
        z = pos.z
    })
end

function Dispense( obj )
	local pos = obj.getPosition()
	local originalLockStatus = ObjectLockStates[obj.getGUID()] or false
	
	ObjectLockStates[obj.getGUID()] = nil
	
    obj.setPosition({
        x = pos.x,
        y = pos.y + ConceiledStorageOffset,
        z = pos.z
    })
	
    obj.interactable = true
	obj.setLock( originalLockStatus or false )
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onLoad()
    self.interactable = false;
    self.createButton({
    label = "CUSTOMIZE BOARD",
    click_function = "onButtonClick",
    function_owner = self,
    width = 750,
    height = 75,
    color = {1, 1, 1, 1.0},
    position = {-15.5, 10, -5},
    rotation = {180, 270, 80},
    font_size = 75
})
end

function onButtonClick()
    if self.interactable == false then
        self.interactable = true;
        self.setColorTint({1, 1, 1})
        self.editButton({ label = "LOCK BOARD" })

    else
        self.interactable = false;
        self.editButton({ label = "CUSTOMIZE BOARD"})

    end
end
